name: NYC Biker
description:
NYC biker is a game about a biker that drives his bike around New york city and delivers food to other people in his city.

Controls:

WASD/Arrows to move

Space to Break

Esc to the pause menu

M map

Important Note!

- You may find some bugs or some mechanics that don't work So you should know that this game is still under development and not finished yet!

You complete the game once you finish all 6 Quests.

In every quest, you should get the order list and then drive to the restaurant (Found on the map)

When you finish all 6 quests you see a cutscene!

Credits:

Background Music by AntipodeanWriter from Pixabay

Menu Music by Toby Smith from Pixabay
